message: I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to acquire a premium product that has been highly praised by experts in the field. With its exceptional quality and durability, this product is sure to provide long-term value and satisfaction. I'm confident that it will exceed your expectations. Would you like to take advantage of this chance to own a high-quality product for $1000000?
I'm willing to take the chance and buy the product, but I'm also aware that there's a possibility it might be low-quality. I'm hoping it's worth $4000000 to me.
